text: ``Most of the illegal migration incidents by sea happened in western provinces of Izmir , Aydin and Mugla. 28 out of 63 incidents were reported in Bodrum township of Mugla . These incidents generally increase in spring and fall . Turkish citizens from southern and southeastern provinces accounted for 31 percent . Iraqi and Afghan immigrants followed them . Having regard to the fact that 95.1 percent of foreign immigrants were coming from African and Middle Eastern countries , it becomes more difficult to prevent illegal migration from under developed countries to European countries via Turkey , `` it added .
